title: Writing for Performance Craft
description: A survey of experimental approaches to the writing and production of performance works in a range of literary genres. Emphasis will be placed on the integration of written texts with nonverbal elements from the visual arts, theatre, and music. Readings and lectures will accompany creative exercises. Restricted to major codes LT34 and LT42 and minor codes LT34 and LT39 during first pass of registration. All other students may register during second pass of registration with the approval of the department.  Prerequisites:  LTWR 8A or 8B.
